website_summaries.verdict: Silver-finish stainless steel case, ultra-thin (max 6.5 millimeter) with minimalist styling.
pros: Men and women love this watch
High-quality Japanese quartz movement keeps precise time
Simple, easy-to-read, two-hand dial with stick hour markers
Adjustable mesh band can be swapped for colorful nylon bands from manufacturer
Water resistant to 30 meters, 1-year limited warranty
cons: Band size may not fit some users

customer_reviews.title: Compared to the Tonnier I can say that this one is a little bit...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking minimalist watch that catch attention, not as thin as it looks in the description pictures, the mesh doesn't catch hairs and has a double lock that is very safe, also adjusting the strap is very easy and doesn't look bulky when you wear it, in comparison with the Tonnier that looks similar I can say it is thicker, the strap is the same, the lock is way better, for water resistance I think this is better although I haven't haf issues with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE EMANUEL GAZZANO SENDRA

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is just beautiful!! Minimalist clean design and a great steel band. Keeps perfect time and so incredibly affordable!! I bought a second one too.
customer_reviews.author: Tumbao

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say really This is a nice looking and comfortable watch that has a very reasonable price tag on it Have been wearing it about 4 outa 7 days of the week and have no real complaints Time has kept up as well as any watch I have ever owned and somehow when it first arived at my house it actually had the correct time set on it to the region I live in If your looking for a very affordable watch at a crazy cheap price definitely get one of these bad boys and you will not regret it
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Tighten the clasp on the band
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Thin design. Accurate time keeping. Excellent for the price. Very helpful customer service. One note of caution. The watch comes with a small screwdriver to tighten the clasp for band adjutment. Check the tightness of the clasp on the band every once in a while. Good product and value. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victor S. Aramati

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Watch. No rergets!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome. Personally, I don’t wear many accessories, but the one thing I wear all day every day (except soccer games) is this watch. The metal mesh band is beautiful and really tough. I’ve caught this watch on railings, doors, windows, etc, and it hasn’t broken at all. I’ve also dropped it onto contretemps and it didn’t shatter or even scratch. Great watch, great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bushfield

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: FOR THE PRICE, this watch looks expensive. Wear it with the right outfit and you will look like you paid much more than it cost! I don't know how it will hold up so I purchased an additional like-new used one. Anyone reviewing saying it looks cheap may not have ever owned or seen any of the high-end $$$ slim line watches before because large and gaudy doesn't mean expensive. To me, this is best worn with a nicely tailored suit....at least, that's my style
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical because of the price, but am thoroughly pleased. I needed a thinner watch to go with my French cuff shirts, and this looks and works beautifully. UPDATE: Two years later and the watch looks and works as good as it did when I purchased it. VERY happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R Erwin

customer_reviews.title: The watch has worked for three days!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch for the money, and it is like Skagen-like( a famous Danish watchmaker) in appearance. It is not ultra thin, but not overly bulky. I was surprised that the watch did not stop keeping time after 3 days and would say it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: A 5 once i fix it.
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks and it feels like really good quality. The only problem is my watch is ahead of time, which seems to be a problem only I encountered, and the knob isnt doing anything. Other than that it's definitely a really good watch.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Flores

customer_reviews.title: Trust Your Instinct! You Will Not Be Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I hope...sleek, black face and silver thin band is elegant and casual as well... My husband and I got them for our 18th Wedding Anniversary, they help our day be extra special...because of them being unisex...we are very happy with our idea to purchase them
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels Great!
customer_reviews.text: For the price $20.00 you really can't complain. Really Retro! It looks great on my wrist and doesn't feel cheap. I've only had it for 2 weeks - Even it lasts a year, I got my monies worth = I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Sturdy mesh. Been wearing 24/7 for a week now. No scratches so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Like this watch a lot. I got the silver watch with a white face. At first I thought it was broken but forgot it didn't have a seconds hand on it. Good quality and it gets compliments. The clasp is easy to adjust for whatever size your wrist is. It's just a decent low price minimalistic watch. I have no complaints and I've had it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Classy watch and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, Its so classy! Easy to adjust, super slim and flexible. My co-workers love to see me rock it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Bridgelal

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great clasp not best
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and seems very well built and sturdy. Only complaint is the band clasp doesn’t hold very tight and comes undone sometimes
customer_reviews.author: colby_lindley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch super quick. i am very pleased with the style and quality. It's nicer than I expected. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C

customer_reviews.title: Weak clasp
customer_reviews.text: Received the watch today. Unpacked it, adjusted the band for my wrist size, set the time, placed it on my arm. Looks good but the clasp keeps coming unfastened. Any movement of my arm, it comes loose. Already printed the return label.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Decent watch for money but face will crack easily.
customer_reviews.text: Watch fit well, looked great, ran fine for the 3 months he had it but the glass face is thin - it fell about 3 ft from boyfriend's pocket onto our laminate wood flooring and shattered/cracked. For those that don't know that flooring is pretty soft so really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dressy,yet great when worn with casual wear as well.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. Nice watch. Light weight,easy to read and set. Looks more expensive than the low price charged.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Cole

customer_reviews.title: battery lasted only 6 months,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April.I was quite satisfied until it stopped in late October. Apparently the battery ran out. If I'd paid the current price (~$20) I would have given it only one star. But I paid $6.22, and it's possible it was used (I can't tell), so I gave it three.
customer_reviews.author: R. H. Monson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing. I purchased on August 10th and I noticed today October 2nd it stoped keeping time at all. Edit: got a refund
customer_reviews.author: B. Rowberry

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking watch. It keeps good time. BUT, the band is about as adjustable as the length of a ruler. Forget the instructions. Mine won't budge even a fraction of an inch.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wolfe-Fabian

customer_reviews.title: It's sleek!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for a son who liked it very much--he called it sleek! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: phoebesmom

customer_reviews.title: a great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch and band look great. Nice large easy to read face. Band clasp a lttle difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best watch I ever had. Fits perfect and looks great
customer_reviews.author: RCA

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. The band and clasp are very strong. Looks like an expensive watch.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Danner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the adjustable feature.. light on your wrist .. eye catching
customer_reviews.author: Toni A

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Very immune to water, no one believes it was this cheap!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Peters

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I like the simple lines of this thin watch and it keeps good time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery J. Kochy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like my watch it looks good and feels good. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: arnold silva

customer_reviews.title: Durability, function and looks.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product, am thinking about ordering this product in other jewel tones. P.S. would like this product in an oblong shape.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch and wore it for our wedding. It looked great and more expensive than it is. Goes well with formal attire
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Webb

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little watch, especially for the price. Looks as pictured, fits well has kept to e for the month Ive had it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Watch with this price (40mm dial) - Bought in $19.99
customer_reviews.text: Belt looks really nice. Easy to adjustible. Overall, it looks expensive watch like $100-$150
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like an expensive time piece. Received tones of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Stops running repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. has stopped running repeatedly. Not worth buying---look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Harold P.

customer_reviews.title: ... and off but now I figured it out and love it!
customer_reviews.text: At first was hard to get on and off but now I figured it out and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This watch is nice you can dress it up or wear it everyday. Works well and light.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Allen

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the watch for myself as I like a large faced watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the watch for myself as I like a large faced watch. I like how it is thin. I can still wear bracelets around it. However I was disappointed that it was running when I received it. I just wonder how much batter life I will still have left.
customer_reviews.author: Sue A. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, for my brother and he liked it. Has a nice sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but mine did not work
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful, but mine did not work. The hour hands did not line up correctly at the top of each hour, basically, you could not tell what time it was. Another problem was that the band did not connect, so the watch would not stay on your wrist. However, it was a beautiful watch, I am sending this defective one back and ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch, But Hard to Set the Time
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful watch, especially for the price! My one complaint (hence 4 stars instead of 5) is that the time is hard to set: the hands jump when I push in the stem. Otherwise, no complaints! Update: the company sent me a replacement watch at no charge without me even asking, so 4 stars becomes 5! Thanks, Sinobi!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch was not as expected. Face of watch and ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch was not as expected. Face of watch and band were ok, but it would not lock down, and that part of the watch looked extremely cheap.
customer_reviews.author: JCT

customer_reviews.title: First of all this is a really good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: First of all this is a really good looking watch. However in less than a week the crystal and minute hand disappeared. I hope y'all have better luck than I did.
customer_reviews.author: exhippie

customer_reviews.title: unless you have a huge wrist this is not the ...
customer_reviews.text: unless you have a huge wrist this is not the watch for you, The band almost wraps around to the watch face and my wrist is not that small. Being a Seal no one ever questioned my wrist size. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SINOBI Ultra Thin Minimalist Stainless Steel Mesh Band Mens Watch Unisex Wrist Watch
product_meta.description:
About us:Guangdong Yonghong Watch&Clock Co,.Ltd is a famous company in watch manufacturing industry in China. Established in 1996 which has more than 20 years watch manufacturing experience,meanwhile our company is the president unit of Guangdong Province Watch&Clock Association. 
SINOBI is a famous brand in China, had become very famous and popular all around the word. in 2016-2017, SINOBI is the top brand in Aliexpress . 
SINOBI watches design follow one rule:combine simple and fashion. all the SINOBI watch have high quality: such as 3ATM water resistance, IP plating, Japan movement. so if you buy our watches, there is no need to worry about the quality.

feature_bullets: ★Minimalist Design:ultra thin stainless steel case,thickness reach to 6.5MM,dial diameter 40MM,suitable for both men and women.
★Precise Time Keeping: high quality Japanese quartz movement providing precise and accurate time keeping
★Easy Reading: simple dial design with only 2 hands,no second hand,simple and classic
★DIY Watch Band: adjustable mesh band, can change to colourful nylon band,we can provide any thing you wanted.
★Water Resistant:30 ATM，can keep the watch while washing hands and rainning , please do NOT wear it when diving, swimming, snorkeling
